entry.title: Python and the Holy Grail of Causal Inference
entry.summary:
Description

Causal Inference, AKA how effective is your new product, policy or feature? Inspired by AB testing in tech, organizations have turned to randomized testing. However, randomization often fails, leaving us in a biased reality. Join us on our quest to dispel myths about randomized testing and build practical models for effect measurement in business situations, in this Eneco-Heineken joint talk.
